description: Distance between the smaller members of successive twin prime pairs.
comments: Conjecture: a(n) < log(A014574(n))^3 for n > 2. - _Thomas Ordowski_, Jul 21 2012This is of course also the distance between the larger members of successive twin primes. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jun 03 2014
links: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..107406
prog: (PARI) {cnt=0; lp= /*last*/ ltp=/*last twin(upper)*/ 5;forprime(p=lp+1,default(primelimit), if(p-lp != 2,lp=p;next);write("b053319.txt",cnt++" "p-ltp);/* print1(p-ltp", ");*/ ltp=lp=p)} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, May 26 2007
crossrefs: First differences of A001359, A006512, and of A014574.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 06 2000
extensions: Definition clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 08 2011
